name: Look
tagline: An image sharing website and social network
body:
### Come on in!
Look is currently under development and not yet live. We're sorry! It will be as soon as it's ready.

### What is it?
Look is an image sharing website and social network focused on giving users the ability to easily share and explore images. User's can comment and vote on each other's images and keep in touch by messaging each other.

### Built with Java
Look is coded in Java 1.8 using JDBC, Apache Commons, and PrettyTime libraries. The front-end is developed using the Foundation front-end framework.

### Contributors
The Look development team consists of Kevin Holland (@kholland950), Trey McDeane (@tmcdeane), Mark Hensler (@mhensler88), and Matt Fonner (@mfonner).

### Open Source
Look uses the Apache 2.0 License and supports open source development. See the full license here http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html.  

If you would like to contribute to the project, contact any team member.

### For more information
Contact Kevin Holland at kevinholland94@gmail.com or on GitHub (@kholland950)
